name: São Tomé
description: The capital city offers a blend of colonial architecture, vibrant markets, and rich history. Visitors can explore the local culture through its music, art, and culinary delights.

name: Principe Island
description: This UNESCO Biosphere Reserve is known for its pristine beaches, lush rainforests, and diverse wildlife. It's a perfect escape for nature lovers and those looking for tranquility.

name: Obo National Park
description: A stunning national park that features lush rainforests, rivers, and waterfalls. It’s home to unique wildlife and offers hiking trails for adventure seekers.

name: Ribeira Iye
description: A hidden gem with beautiful waterfalls and serene natural pools, perfect for a refreshing swim. It's a great spot for picnics and enjoying nature.

name: Ilha das Rolas
description: This small island is located on the equator and features stunning beaches and clear waters. It’s a great place for snorkeling and relaxing away from the crowds.

name: São Sebastião Fort
description: A historic fort built in the 16th century, offering stunning views of the sea and the city. It’s an important part of the island's colonial history.

name: Cascata de São Nicolau
description: A breathtaking waterfall surrounded by lush vegetation, perfect for photography and nature walks. The sound of the cascading water is truly enchanting.

name: Roça Monte Café
description: A former cocoa plantation that now serves as a cultural site where visitors can learn about the history of cocoa production in São Tomé and sample local chocolate.

name: Praia Jale
description: A secluded beach known for its golden sands and clear waters, ideal for sunbathing and swimming. It's less crowded, providing a peaceful retreat.

name: Pico Cao Grande
description: A striking volcanic plug that rises dramatically from the landscape, offering hiking opportunities and breathtaking views. It's a must-see for adventure enthusiasts.

name: São Tomé Botanical Garden
description: Home to a variety of tropical plants and trees, this garden is a peaceful place to explore and learn about the island’s flora. It’s perfect for leisurely walks.

name: Baía das Agulhas
description: A picturesque bay known for its dramatic cliffs and stunning ocean views. It's an excellent spot for photography and enjoying the sunset.

name: Church of São João
description: An architectural gem with beautiful stained glass windows and a rich history. It reflects the colonial past and religious traditions of the island.

name: Canoe Tour in Praia da Concha
description: Experience the beauty of the coastline and marine life through a guided canoe tour. It's a fun way to explore hidden coves and enjoy the ocean.

name: Pico de São Tomé
description: The highest peak in São Tomé, offering challenging hiking trails and panoramic views of the island. It’s a rewarding adventure for experienced hikers.

name: Roça São João
description: A restored plantation that tells the story of the island’s agricultural history. Visitors can see the traditional methods of growing cocoa and coffee.

name: Tchiloli Theatre
description: A unique cultural performance that combines music, dance, and drama, reflecting the island's history and traditions. Attending a performance is a must for cultural enthusiasts.

name: Praia do Mico
description: A tranquil beach known for its clear waters and abundant marine life, making it ideal for snorkeling and swimming. It's a perfect spot for a relaxing day.

name: Cabo Verde Lighthouse
description: An iconic lighthouse that stands as a beacon for sailors, offering stunning coastal views. It's a popular spot for photography and enjoying the ocean breeze.

name: Cascata de São Miguel
description: A beautiful waterfall located in a lush green setting, perfect for a refreshing swim and a picnic. It's a lesser-known spot that offers tranquility and natural beauty.

name: Roça da Praia
description: An old cocoa plantation that has been partially restored, offering insights into the island's agricultural heritage. Visitors can explore the old buildings and surrounding gardens.

name: Pérola do Atlântico
description: A charming beach bar offering local drinks and snacks, perfect for relaxing after a day of exploration. It has a laid-back vibe with stunning ocean views.

name: Furnas do Encontro de Águas
description: A unique natural phenomenon where two rivers meet yet do not mix, creating a striking visual contrast. It's a fascinating site for nature lovers.

name: Café Cacau
description: A local café where visitors can taste the island's famous cocoa and chocolate products. It's a delightful experience for food lovers and chocoholics.

name: Cascata do Cão
description: A hidden waterfall that offers a serene escape into nature, surrounded by lush vegetation. It’s a great spot for hiking and enjoying the beauty of the island.

name: Museu Nacional de São Tomé e Príncipe
description: The national museum showcases the rich history and culture of São Tomé and Príncipe through artifacts, photographs, and exhibitions.

name: Ilhéu das Rolas
description: A small, picturesque island known for its stunning beaches and rich biodiversity. It's a peaceful spot for snorkeling and enjoying nature.
